name: dishWashing_cancel
description: This function is used to cancel an in-progress dishwashing cycle on a specified SmartThings dishwasher.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the dishwasher is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the dishwasher is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name of the dishwasher whose dishwashing cycle needs to be canceled.

parameters.name: compartment
parameters.description: The predefined compartment of the dishwasher whose dishwashing cycle needs to be canceled.
